cards.name: FX-550 Skygrasper

wargear: This unit may take 1 [Striker Pack] unit.

wargear.name: Beam Cannon
wargear.description: When targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, attacks from this weapon score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

other.name: Bombing Run
other.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Striker Pack
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have a [Striker Pack] unit, attach the appropriate [Striker Pack] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Aile Pack
abilities.description: This model gains the [Fly] keyword, add 3" to the bearer's Move characteristic, and add 3 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model gains the following wargear: 1 Beam Rifle; 1 Beam Sabers.

other.name: Special Ranged Weapons
other.description: * If a [Character] model is equipped with this weapon, improve this weapon’s Ballistic Skill characteristic by 1 and remove [Heavy]. If the model is also an [Epic Hero], improve this weapon's Ballistic Skill characteristic by an additional 1.

other.name: Special Melee Weapons
other.description: ᐩ If a [Character] model is equipped with this weapon, improve this weapon’s Attacks characteristic by 1.  If the model is also an [Epic Hero], improve this weapon's Weapon Skill characteristic by 1 as well.
